item.title: Reporting Science in Financial Times
item.author: Nina Kearsey,Be?at Gurrutxaga-Lerma,
item.description: To begin, as interviews commonly do, with some scene-setting by way of a weather report, it was a cold albeit sunny morning (one of those ironies so common to the English winter) when we met with the Financial Times’ Clive Cookson to talk science and business.
